@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+#ifndef CODESEARCH_RECURSION_H
+#define CODESEARCH_RECURSION_H
+
+class RecursionCounter {
+public:
+    RecursionCounter(int &depth) : depth_(depth) {
+        depth_++;
+    }
+    ~RecursionCounter() {
+        depth_--;
+    }
+protected:
+    int &depth_;
+};
+
+#endif
